segments.text: This is IBA Bank , Claire speaking , how may I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , hello , yes , arm ... I've just lost my bank stuff .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry , could you be a little more specific ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know my bank stuff . My card , my book ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , I will have to take some details from you . Could you tell me your name , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Jim Chan . The account's in my name . Is that all you need to know ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not quite , Sir . We will need to also know the account number , the deposited amount and your PIN number . You will also have to come in and fill out some forms .
segments.speaker: S1
